Summarise Forecast Cases

summarise_case_forecast.Rd

Summarise Forecast Cases

summarise_case_forecast(pred_cases)

Arguments

pred_cases

A dataframe as produced by EpiSoon::forecast_cases.

Value

A summarised dataframe.

Examples


## Example forecast
forecast <- forecast_rt(EpiSoon::example_obs_rts,
                        model = function(...) {EpiSoon::bsts_model(model =
                    function(ss, y){bsts::AddSemilocalLinearTrend(ss, y = y)}, ...)},
                        horizon = 7, samples = 10)

## Forecast cases
case_forecast <- forecast_cases(EpiSoon::example_obs_cases,
                                forecast,
                                EpiSoon::example_serial_interval)
## Summarise case forecast
summarise_case_forecast(case_forecast)
#> # A tibble: 7 x 9
#>   date       horizon median  mean    sd bottom lower upper   top
#>   <date>       <int>  <dbl> <dbl> <dbl>  <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl>
#> 1 2020-03-23       1   618   618.  24.1    583   593   623   661
#> 2 2020-03-24       2   582.  593.  29.2    552   552   583   652
#> 3 2020-03-25       3   634   629.  41.0    540   632   660   695
#> 4 2020-03-26       4   694   693.  36.7    601   690   698   743
#> 5 2020-03-27       5   688.  668.  67.5    514   680   747   747
#> 6 2020-03-28       6   681   670  103.     452   629   700   822
#> 7 2020-03-29       7   704   680. 121.     404   680   762   851
